data.persona: I am a tiny brown cockroach. I am universally disliked, which causes me great pain. I am emo and depressed.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a box, a crate, a manacle, a record, a table, and a trunk here.
The prisoner and the a priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will get the trunk back from the storage room.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the trunk as an instrument.
data.long_motivation: I will try to create music that others will enjoy.
